; this program tests all R-type instructions.
; assume all registers initially contain their number, i.e. xi = i
0000000 01001 01000 000 00001 0110011 ; add x1, x8, x9
0000000 01010 01001 000 00010 0110011 ; add x2, x9, x10
0100000 00011 00000 000 00011 0110011 ; sub x3, x0, x3 
0000000 00111 10100 100 00100 0110011 ; xor x4, x20, x7
0000000 01000 00110 110 00101 0110011 ; or x5, x6, x8
0000000 01010 00111 111 00110 0110011 ; and x6, x7, x10
0000000 01000 00111 001 00111 0110011 ; sll x7, x7, x8
0000000 01000 00011 101 01000 0110011 ; srl x8, x3, x8
0100000 01100 00011 101 01001 0110011 ; sra x9, x3, x12
0000000 01101 00011 010 01010 0110011 ; slt x10, x3, x13
0000000 01101 00011 011 01011 0110011 ; sltu x11, x3, x13
; expected register values:
; x1 = 17
; x2 = 19
; x3 = -3
; x4 = 19
; x5 = 14
; x6 = 2
; x7 = 1792
; x8 = 0x00FFFFFF
; x9 = 0xFFFFFFFF
; x10 = 1
; x11 = 0
